javax.management.monitor

Class Monitor.MonitorTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.monitor.Monitor.MonitorTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Monitor

    private class Monitor.MonitorTask
extends Object
implements Runnable
    MonitorTask nested class: This class implements the Runnable interface. The MonitorTask is executed periodically with a given fixed delay by the Scheduled Executor Service.

      When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

      • run

        public void run()
        Description copied from interface: Runnable
        When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread.

        The general contract of the method run is that it may take any action whatsoever.

        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        See Also:
        Thread.run()
